title: Markets Update: A “Gritty” Second Quarter
description: Jim Esposito, global co-head of Goldman Sachs’ Global Markets Division, recaps a “gritty” second quarter, the importance of technological resilience, and the ongoing commitment to client centricity.
itunes:author: Goldman Sachs
itunes:summary: Jim Esposito, global co-head of Goldman Sachs’ Global Markets Division, recaps a “gritty” second quarter, the importance of technological resilience, and the ongoing commitment to client centricity.
